################################
 Export Contract Data Form View
################################

.. |badge1| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/maturity-Beta-yellow.png

   :target: https://odoo-community.org/page/development-status

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3|

This module adds the "export" action to the contract form view

Overwrites the `_getActionMenuItems` method from the JS form_controller
from the web module

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

***************
 Configuration
***************

No configuration needed.
